title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync (1GILQD5)
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When you export a directory (project) and place the exported jar in the same directory (project), an out of sync message is displayed when you overwrite the exported jar file the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to prevent the out of sync issue.
SR: 1. Open a project in the application. 2. Export the project directory as a jar file. 3. Save the exported jar file in the same directory. 4. Overwrite the exported jar file. 5. Observe the out of sync message.
